head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DAVISON, MAE F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DAVISON, MAE F.

block.p: DAVISON-Mae F. On October 23, 2000. Formerly of St. George, Staten Island. Beloved wife of the late Thomas H. Davison. Sister of the late Joseph A. Ferrante. Dear aunt of Arthur Ferrante of Sea Girt, NJ. Mrs. Davison was active in historic and cultural organizations on Staten Island. For further information Meehan Funeral Home, Spring Lake Heights, New Jersey.
